author: Subhajit Ganguly

resources.description: Department of Electronics and Information Technology (DeitY), M/o C&IT, GoI provides R&D grants to various Academic and Research organizations for undertaking R&D in emerging ICT areas. Details of the Patents Granted under such DeitY funding can be obtained from this dataset.
resources.name: Patents Granted Under Research and Development Funding of DeitY
